snippet.title: Hellpoint: Blue Sun DLC - Launch Trailer | Next Gen Upgrade
snippet.description:
Venture deeper into the menacing world of cosmic horrors with Blue Sun, the long-awaited add-on for the darkest sci-fi aRPG out there.
https://www.playhellpoint.com/

The expansion introduces new gear, a whole new parallel dimension to explore, and, of course, monstrosities to battle. Blue Sun is available now on Steam, GOG, Epic Games Store, PlayStation Store (PS4, PS5) and Microsoft Store (Xbox One). Xbox Series owners can play the add-on now, using the backward compatibility and the Microsoft Smart Delivery feature. Blue Sun is coming to Xbox Series natively on July 26th. 

The free next generation upgrade is now available for PS4 owners of Hellpoint. On PS5, the game will run in 4K resolution, performing at 60 FPS with shorter loading times. The Xbox next gen upgrade for the Series X/S consoles is going to be released on July 26th.
